Yes.text: What would you like to eat?

Hamburger.text: I will order hamburger for you!

Pizza.text: Would you like pizza with mushrooms?

Yes.text: Ok, I will order the best pizza for you.

Pop Corn.text: I will order pop corn for you!

Chicken.text: I will order chicken for you!

tree.text: Do you want to check the weather forecast?

Yes.text: What kind of weather forecast do you prefer?

Daily.text: I'll send you the weather forecast for the day.

Weekly.text: I'll send you the weather forecast for the week.

Monthly.text: I'll send you the weather forecast for the month.

No.text: Ask me when you want to get a weather forecast.
